name: Two Dimensional Tactics
description:
Created for the Genre Mash Jam, 2DT combines the genres of platforming and turn-based strategy. Move units, cast spells, and fight enemies in a 2D environment.

Controls:

Left-click to select a unit on your turn. Right click to unselect. With a unit selected, use WASD to move around (W is the jump button.) Cycle through available spells with Q. To cast the selected spell, press E. Some spells target the mouse cursor. Move the cursor to the edge of the screen to move the camera.

Concept and coding by Ephraim225. Graphics and some coding by Marsgreekgod.
